name: Moves
description:
This game has great inspiration in the game qop.

Moves is a minimalist puzzle game where you must use your mathematical skills to solve tricky puzzles.
Collect the right numbers and operations to make progress.

- FullHD
- 40 achievements
- 40 levels (from simple to insufferably difficult)
- Smooth animation

Controls: WASD or ARROWS
Restart level: R
